question: Is airplane stroke syndrome a common disease.
ideal_answer: No. Only 37 cases of stroke during or soon after long-haul flights have been published. A single center study reported that 42 out of 5727 stroke admissions (0.73%) were flight-related strokes.

snippets.text: Only 37 cases of stroke during or soon after long-haul flights have been published to our knowledge.
Our centre admitted 5727 stroke patients, of whom 42 (0.73%) had flight-related strokes.
The authors report three cases of ischemic stroke in young adults that occurred during or after an airplane flight.
